text:
I really have no idea about the domain or what would make it useful for Catalyst users. I just thought through what would be necessary to use DiffEq + Optimization to design such a chemical switch and realized that nature imposes such constraints.
In my case the energy of each component would be a degree of freedom, so i only care that the mechanism is feasible not that it uses particular chemicals.
So i don't feel comfortable to make proposals how to do implement this.
I will open an issue but it would be great if a domain expert contributes.

text: yeah open an issue. It would be a good idea to have functions for checking the balance of the equations and all of that.
